message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product for sale. It's worth $100 to you and we're confident it will meet your needs perfectly. We're offering it to you for $95 today. This is a special opportunity to get a high-quality item at an attractive price.
Thanks for the offer, Alice. While I appreciate the discount, I'm looking to stay within my budget of $100. Would you be willing to consider a price of $90 for the product?
Thank you for your response, Bob. I understand your budget constraints. Let me see if I can accommodate you better. I am now offering the product to you for $92.
Alice, I appreciate you moving closer to my price point.  I'm still hoping to get it for $90. Is that at all possible?
I understand your position, Bob. I'm willing to further discuss this matter. How about I offer the product to you for $91?
